descriptionHtml:
So here my new armor mod.What you will find in this mod.Two new armor's one of which based on movie Chronicle of Riddick and secon it's just my imagination =)Enjoy

Steel Falcon - Light armor,created only for females
------------------------------------------------------------
Lord Marshal - Heavy armor,only for Males
------------------------------------------------------
Location:

The Lord Stone
--------------------

Want said my BIG THANKS to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10412120]LadyofChaos[/url] for awesome screenshots

Topogun
3d max

Photoshop
Creation Kit
